template.template_name: Installation and Qualification of NanoRam 1064 Handheld Raman Spectrometer
template.description: Change Control record for installation and qualification of NanoRam 1064 units and respective data management software (NID EX) at Tampa site.

fields.Title_of_Change: Installation and Qualification of NanoRam 1064 Handheld Raman Spectrometer and its respective data management software, NID EX for Tampa site.

fields.Description_of_Change: Installation and Qualification of three NanoRam 1064 handheld spectrometer units, its operating system NOS-1064, and its respective data management software, NID EX in Tampa site. This includes installation and qualification of three NanoRam 1064 units and associated NOS-1064 software managed under NID EX. The new Raman spectrometer units offer an alternative chemical ID testing for packaging components and raw materials in Tampa manufacturing. This supports faster, cost-effective testing while maintaining data integrity for product testing and aligns with the CORE 2.0 GLIMS Paperless Lab project.

Specific_Products_List: 034 - Neomycin and Polymyxin B Sulfates and Gramicidin Ophthalmic Solution

fields.Comments: Implementation supports Tampa site testing optimization and regulatory compliance. The alternative ID testing setup provides cost savings and faster turnaround without compromising quality.
